Question: This person had worried that the flight was too dangerous and had arranged for a doctor to be on hand.
Hints: This person thought it might be possible to generate undulating electrical currents that corresponded to sound waves.
He had two brothers: Melville James **** (1845–70) and Edward James **** (1848–67).
Returning in 1886, this person started building an estate on a point across from Baddeck, overlooking Bras d'Or Lake.
